location_name: A New Brain Imaging System, Connectome

events.name: “A Transformative Leap in Brain Imaging”: Innovative MRI System May Produce First Full Brain Connection Map
events.description: A new brain imaging system, Connectome 2.0, is far outperforming traditional MRIs in imaging microscopic brain structure disruptions.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in A New Brain Imaging System, Connectome - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Discover the pioneering work of neuroscientist Roger Sperry, who developed the first full brain connection map using his innovative MRI system. Explore the Connectome exhibit at the Mütter Museum in Philadelphia to learn about this groundbreaking research and its impact on our understanding of the human brain.
